::Magmatron::

    "Both very good questions." Magmatrons said. "The origins it would tie us 
to would be the first Destron, me. It's what my scientists back on Cybertron 
could think of when they created the machine. I am not realted to the 
Decpticons or the Autobots. I am more closely related to the Quintessions. 
Although it is not as if I am a direct desendant.
    "For the second question, we are against both Maximal and Predacon. I do 
not want to destroy them completly, but I would like to change their forms to 
be my own. And those that refuse will be allowed to exist, but they will be 
monitored, this is all once I control Cybertron.
    "Now as soon as Bobertron comes out of the CR chamber I will change him. 
Just so you can see exactly what happens."
